CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Activate a Running Application by Name
CodeSnippet.Title: Activate a Running Application by Name
CodeSnippet.Description: Activates a running application using the name of the application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Activate a Running Application by Process ID
CodeSnippet.Title: Activate a Running Application by Process ID
CodeSnippet.Description: Activates a running application using the process ID of the application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Capture Output from a Console Application
CodeSnippet.Title: Capture Output from a Console Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Saves the output from a command console application to a string.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Change the Foreground and Background Colors in a Console Window
CodeSnippet.Title: Change the Foreground and Background Colors in a Console Window
CodeSnippet.Description: Changes the background and text color of the console window.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Check for Update to ClickOnce Application
CodeSnippet.Title: Check for Update to ClickOnce Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Checks whether updates to the application are available for download.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Clear the Console Window
CodeSnippet.Description: Clears the console window.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Delete File from Isolated Storage
CodeSnippet.Description: Deletes file from isolated storage.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Amount of Isolated Storage Available.
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Amount of Isolated Storage Available.
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines the Amount of Isolated Storage Available.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Scope of Isolated Storage
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Scope of Isolated Storage
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines the scope of the isolated storage.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Find the Names of Resources in an Assembly
CodeSnippet.Title: Find the Names of Resources in an Assembly
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns a list of all the resources in an assembly.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Load a Cursor File from an Assembly
CodeSnippet.Title: Load a Cursor File from an Assembly
CodeSnippet.Description: Sets the cursor of a Windows form from a cursor file that is an embedded resource of the application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Load an Assembly at Run Time
CodeSnippet.Title: Load an Assembly at Run Time
CodeSnippet.Description: Loads an assembly at run time.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Make an Asynchronous Method Call
CodeSnippet.Description: Makes an asynchronous method call using the BackgroundWorker component.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Read and Write from the Console Window
CodeSnippet.Title: Read and Write from the Console Window
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a prompt and then reads in the user request. It is run from a console application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read Command Line Arguments
CodeSnippet.Description: Iterates through the command line arguments.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read Text from Isolated Storage
CodeSnippet.Description: Reads the text from a file in isolated storage.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve an Image that Is an Application Resource
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve an Image that Is an Application Resource
CodeSnippet.Description: Assigns an image resource in the My Application designer to the PictureBox1's Image property.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve a Text File from an Assembly's Resources
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve a Text File from an Assembly's Resources
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the text from a file that is an embedded resource of an assembly.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Save Text in Isolated Storage
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a string to the assembly or user-isolated storage.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Send Keystrokes to an Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Sends keystrokes to an application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Stop an Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Closes all the running instances of Notepad.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Write a Message to the Application Log
CodeSnippet.Title: Write a Message to the Application Log
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a message to the application log.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Write to a Text file
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a message to the application event log.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

SnippetDir.LocalizedName: Fundamentals - Collections, Data Types, File System, Math

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert an ArrayList to a Strongly Typed Array
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert an ArrayList to a Strongly Typed Array
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts an ArrayList to a strongly typed array using ToArray(Type)
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Create a list with items of a single type.
CodeSnippet.Title: Create a list with items of a single type.
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a collection to hold a specific type of items.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Create a keyed collection with one item type.
CodeSnippet.Title: Create a keyed collection with one item type.
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a dictionary to hold specific types of items indexed by key.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a sorted dictionary.
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a sorted dictionary to hold a specific type of items.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Define a type comparer to be used in sorting routines.
CodeSnippet.Title: Define a type comparer to be used in sorting routines.
CodeSnippet.Description: Compares two objects and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Index into a strongly typed dictionary using a key.
CodeSnippet.Title: Index into a strongly typed dictionary using a key.
CodeSnippet.Description: Indexes into strongly typed dictionary by using a key.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Initialize a One-Dimensional Array
CodeSnippet.Description: Initializes a one-dimensional array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Iterate through a collection.
CodeSnippet.Description: Iterates through specific item types in a collection.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Iterate through a dictionary.
CodeSnippet.Description: Iterates through all the items in a dictionary.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Iterate through a sorted dictionary by key.
CodeSnippet.Title: Iterate through a sorted dictionary by key.
CodeSnippet.Description: Iterates through all the items in a dictionary based on the sorted list of keys.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Locate an Element in an Array
CodeSnippet.Title: Locate an Element in an Array
CodeSnippet.Description: Finds the index of a given element in an array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort An Array
CodeSnippet.Description: Declares an array of String objects, populates it, and then sorts it alphabetically.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert a Byte() to an Image
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert a Byte() to an Image
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts a Byte() to an image. Byte arrays are often how image information is stored in a database
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert an Array of Bytes into a String
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert an Array of Bytes into a String
CodeSnippet.Description: Convert an Array of Bytes into a String
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert a Number to a Hexadecimal String
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert a Number to a Hexadecimal String
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns the hexadecimal representation of an integer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert a Number to a Octal String
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert a Number to a Octal String
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns the octal string representation of an integer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert a String to a Byte Array
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert a String to a Byte Array
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts a string to a byte array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert between Hiragana and Katakana Characters (Japanese Only)
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert between Hiragana and Katakana Characters (Japanese Only)
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts between Hiragana and Katakana characters in a String.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert between Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese Characters
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert between Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese Characters
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts between Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese characters in a String.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert between Wide and Narrow Characters
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert between Wide and Narrow Characters
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts between Wide and Narrow characters in Strings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Span between Two Dates
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Span between Two Dates
CodeSnippet.Description: Calculates the difference in days between two dates and also constructs a TimeSpan value for that difference.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Span between Two Times
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Span between Two Times
CodeSnippet.Description: Calculates the difference in seconds between two times in the same day, and also constructs a TimeSpan value for that difference.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Generate Multiline String Literals
CodeSnippet.Description: Constructs a string literal that is three lines long.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert an Image to a Byte()
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert an Image to a Byte()
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts an Image to a Byte(). Byte arrays are often how image information is stored in a database
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Parse an E-mail Address
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns the user name and provider name from an e-mail address.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Remove Parts of a String
CodeSnippet.Description: Removes all occurrences of one string from another string.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

SnippetSubDir.LocalizedName: File System - Processing Drives, Folders, and Files

CodeSnippet.Title: Compare Two Files
CodeSnippet.Description: Compares two files.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Copy a Directory
CodeSnippet.Description: Copies a directory and all its files and subdirectories.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Copy a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Copies the file Source.txt to a second file, Copy.txt.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a new file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Folder
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a new folder on the computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Temporary File Name
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a name for a temporary file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Delete a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Deletes a file after confirming deletion with the user.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Determine if a File Exists
CodeSnippet.Description: Sets a Boolean variable indicating whether a specified file exists.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Determine if a Folder Exists
CodeSnippet.Description: Sets a Boolean variable indicating whether a specified folder exists.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Size of a File
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Size of a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Obtains the size of a file and assigns it to a variable
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Enumerate the Drives on a Computer
CodeSnippet.Title: Enumerate the Drives on a Computer
CodeSnippet.Description: Enumerates the drives on a computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Find Amount of Disk Space Available
CodeSnippet.Title: Find Amount of Disk Space Available
CodeSnippet.Description: Obtains the amount of disk space available.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Get Information About a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Obtains an object containing information about a file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Move Files
CodeSnippet.Description: Moves a file to a new directory.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read a Delimited Text File
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns the values in each column and row from a text file with comma-delimited data. Other delimiters may be used.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read a Binary File
CodeSnippet.Description: Reads data from a binary file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Read a file in the My Documents folder
CodeSnippet.Title: Read a file in the My Documents folder
CodeSnippet.Description: Reads the contents of a text file in the My Documents folder into a single string.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read Text from a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Reads the contents of a text file into a string.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Rename a Directory
CodeSnippet.Description: Renames a directory.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Rename a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Renames a file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve the Drives on the Local Computer
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve the Drives on the Local Computer
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the drive names on the local computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Search a Directory for Files Recursively
CodeSnippet.Title: Search a Directory for Files Recursively
CodeSnippet.Description: Searches a directory for files recursively.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Search Files for an Expression
CodeSnippet.Description: Searches files in a directory for an expression.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Write Text to a File
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a line of text to a text file, replacing any text if the file exists.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Write to a Binary File
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes bytes to a binary file.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Calculate a Monthly Payment on a Loan
CodeSnippet.Title: Calculate a Monthly Payment on a Loan
CodeSnippet.Description: Calculates the monthly payment on a loan.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Calculate the Cosine of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Title: Calculate the Cosine of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts an angle from degrees to radians and then calculates cosine of the angle
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Calculate the Sum-of-Years Depreciation
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns a Double specifying the sum-of-years digits depreciation of an asset for a specified period.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Calculate the Sine of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Title: Calculate the Sine of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts an angle from degrees to radians and then calculates sine of the angle
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Calculate the Tangent of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Title: Calculate the Tangent of a specified Angle
CodeSnippet.Description: Converts an angle from degrees to radians and then calculates the tangent of the angle
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Get a Random Number using the Random class
CodeSnippet.Title: Get a Random Number using the Random class
CodeSnippet.Description: Generates a random integer between an upper bound and a lower bound.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Add a new row to a typed DataTable
CodeSnippet.Title: Add a new row to a typed DataTable
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds a new row to a typed DataTable

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Call the ExecuteNonQuery Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Title: Call the ExecuteNonQuery Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Description: Calls ExecuteNonQuery on an existing command. Wraps the execution in a try/finally block to return the connection object to it's previous state
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Call the ExecuteReader Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Title: Call the ExecuteReader Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Description: Fetches data from a database using the SqlCommand.ExecuteReader method of an existing data command.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Call the ExecuteScalar Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Title: Call the ExecuteScalar Method of a SqlCommand
CodeSnippet.Description: Executes a SQL statement that returns a single value using the SqlCommand.ExecuteScalar method of an existing data command.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Convert BindingSource.Current to a specific row in a DataTable
CodeSnippet.Title: Convert BindingSource.Current to a specific row in a DataTable
CodeSnippet.Description: Gets the current row within a binding source and converts it to the specific row. Recomended method for capturing the current, rather than using BindingSource.Position which may return a different row based on the sorting of the DataView
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a DataRelation
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a data relation between two data tables in a dataset.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create an Expression Column
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a DataColumn object and sets the DataColumn.Expression property to calculate the order total.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Parameterized SELECT Command
CodeSnippet.Description: Constructs a command object for executing a Select statement with parameters.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Parameterized Stored Procedure
CodeSnippet.Description: Constructs a command object for executing a stored procedure with parameters.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Create a local SQLConnection to SQL Express
CodeSnippet.Title: Create a local SQLConnection to SQL Express
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a SQL Connection providing replacements for the typical connection name/value pairs for a SQL Express Connection using User Instance=True
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Create a Server based SQLConnection to SQL Server
CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Server based SQLConnection to SQL Server
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a SQL Connection providing replacements for the typical connection name/value pairs
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Extend a TableAdapter w/Partial Classes
CodeSnippet.Description: Extends a TableAdapter using partial classes. Includes the namespace required to reference existing TableAdapters
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft

CodeSnippet.Title: Implement Data Try/Catch Blocks
CodeSnippet.Description: Implements a Try/Catch block that handles Exception, DataException, and all the exceptions that derive from DataException.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Read Access Data into a Dataset
CodeSnippet.Title: Read Access Data into a Dataset
CodeSnippet.Description: Loads the data from one table in an Access database into a DataSet object.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Return Output Parameter for a TableAdapter Query
CodeSnippet.Title: Return Output Parameter for a TableAdapter Query
CodeSnippet.Description: TableAdapter methods that "Retun No Value" use ExecuteNonQuery which returns the rows affected. This Snippet returns the value from one of the command parameters on a TableAdapter.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft

CodeSnippet.Title: Filter by a single field
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that filters the results based on a single condition on one field.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Filter by fields not selected
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that filters by fields not selected in the results.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Filter by a function call
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that filters by a call to a function.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Filter by multiple fields
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that filters the results based on conditions on multiple fields.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Distinct results
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that returns distinct rows of data.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Aggregate Into Count() and Sum()
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses an aggregate to count the number of fruits and sum the number of characters.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Aggregate Into Average()
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses an aggregate to calculate the average char count of a fruit name.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Aggregate Into Max()
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses an aggregate to calculate the maximum number of characters in a fruit name.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Group By Into Count()
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that groups results and returns a count of how many items are in each group.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Group By and rename the group
CodeSnippet.Title: Group By and rename the group
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that groups the results and renames the group.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Group By Count() and Sum()
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that groups results, and returns a count of how many items are in each group and a sum of a specific field.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Join (explicit) on an array
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that matches items against elements in an array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Join (implicit) on an array
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that matches items against elements in an array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Group results from 2 sources and retrieve the Count
CodeSnippet.Title: Group results from 2 sources and retrieve the Count
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that groups results from 2 different sources, and returns a count of items in each group.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Group Join - Named Group
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that groups results from 2 different sources, and returns a count of items in each group. A name is given to the groups
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort - Ascending
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that sorts results in ascending order, based on a specified field.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort - Descending
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that sorts results in descending order, based on a specified field.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort by fields not selected
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that sorts by fields not selected in the results.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort and filter a query
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that is sorted and filtered.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Sort by multiple fields
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query that sorts the results by multiple fields.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Skip
CodeSnippet.Description: A query that skips the first n elements of a set of ordered results.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Skip and Take
CodeSnippet.Description: A query that skips the first n elements and then takes the next m elements of a set of ordered results.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Skip While
CodeSnippet.Description: A query that Skips While a specific condition is true.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Take
CodeSnippet.Description: A query that takes the first n elements of a set of ordered results.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Take While
CodeSnippet.Description: A query that Takes While a specific condition is true.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Query over an array
CodeSnippet.Description: A query over an array.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Query over an inline array
CodeSnippet.Description: A query over an array that is declared inside the query.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Query over a collection
CodeSnippet.Description: A query over a collection.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Query over a query
CodeSnippet.Description: A query over the results from another query.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Display results in the Console window
CodeSnippet.Title: Display results in the Console window
CodeSnippet.Description: Displays the results of a query in the Console window.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: For Each over the results of a query
CodeSnippet.Title: For Each over the results of a query
CodeSnippet.Description: A For...Each demonstrating how to iterate over the results of the query.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Display query results in a WebForm grid
CodeSnippet.Title: Display query results in a WebForm grid
CodeSnippet.Description: Displays the results of a query in a WebForm DataGridView control.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Display query results in a WinForm grid
CodeSnippet.Title: Display query results in a WinForm grid
CodeSnippet.Description: Displays the results from a query in a WinForm DataGridView control.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Count query results
CodeSnippet.Description: Counts the number of results from a query.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: From query
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query with the most compact syntax possible.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: From...Order By...Select query
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query with From, Order By, and Select clauses.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: From...Select query
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query with From and Select clauses.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: From...Where...Select query
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query with From, Where, and Select clauses.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Iterate over query results
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a query and demonstrates consumption of that query in a subsequent For Each statement.

CodeSnippet.Title: Keep a Windows Form on Top

CodeSnippet.Title: Move a Window by Dragging the Client Area of the Form

CodeSnippet.Title: Read Entries Created by a Particular Application from the Event Log

CodeSnippet.Title: Write to the Application Event Log from a Specified Source
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a message to the application Event Log.

CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a string to the application event log on the local computer.

CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a public message queue on the local computer.

CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a private message queue on the local computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Description: Uses the Peek method to look at the first message on the queue without removing that message from the queue.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Description: Uses the Purge method to clear the contents of any queue to which you have access rights in the Message Queuing system.

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve a List of Message Queues on the Local Computer
CodeSnippet.Description: Retreives the message queues on the local computer.

CodeSnippet.Title: Send a Message to a Message Queue

CodeSnippet.Description: Sends a message to a queue on the local computer, receives that message, and formats the body as a string.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Specify the Formatter for Retrieved Messages
CodeSnippet.Title: Specify the Formatter for Retrieved Messages
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines how a message body is deserialized.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: List Applications
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a string that contains a list of running application processes.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Open Webpage in Default Browser
CodeSnippet.Description: Opens a webpage in the default browser.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Run a Program Associated with a File Type
CodeSnippet.Title: Run a Program Associated with a File Type
CodeSnippet.Description: Runs a program associated with a file type.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Start an Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Starts the Notepad application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Stop an Application
CodeSnippet.Description: Stops a running application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create a Registry Key
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a registry key.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Delete a Registry Key
CodeSnippet.Description: Deletes a registry key.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine Whether a Registry Key Exists
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine Whether a Registry Key Exists
CodeSnippet.Description: Checks to see if the specified registry key exists.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Read a Registry Value
CodeSnippet.Description: Reads a string registry value from the current user hive.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Write a Registry Value
CodeSnippet.Description: Writes a string registry value to the current user hive.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Respond to changes to Windows User preferences
CodeSnippet.Title: Respond to changes to Windows User preferences
CodeSnippet.Description: Demonstrates how to handle changes made to the Windows user's preferences
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Change Regional Settings
CodeSnippet.Description: Changes regional settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Create an Environment Variable
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a user environment variable that persists between program executions.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Determine Desktop Display Resolution
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines the width and height, in pixels, of the desktop.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Determine the Amount of System Memory Available
CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Amount of System Memory Available
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines the amount of system memory currently available.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Current Windows Version
CodeSnippet.Description: Determines the version of Windows in use
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Determine the Windows System Directory
CodeSnippet.Description: Assigns the System Directory to a String.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Find the Amount of Disk Space Available
CodeSnippet.Title: Find the Amount of Disk Space Available
CodeSnippet.Description: Returns the amount of available disk space on a specified drive.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: List Environment Variables
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a string that lists all the user environment variables and their values.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve Accessibility Preferences
CodeSnippet.Description: Gets a value indicating whether the user has selected to run in high-contrast mode.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve an Environment Variable
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the value of an environment variable.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve User Preferences for Icons
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the user preferences for icon display properties.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve User Preferences for Keyboard Settings
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve User Preferences for Keyboard Settings
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the user's keyboard settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve User Preferences for Menus
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves several menu settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve Mouse Settings
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves several mouse settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve Regional Settings
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves various regional settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve User Preferences for System Colors
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve User Preferences for System Colors
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves just two of the many system color settings.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve Information about Battery Life
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the percent of battery life left, and warns the user if the percent is below five percent.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Retrieve the Current Time on the Local Computer
CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve the Current Time on the Local Computer
CodeSnippet.Description: Displays the current time on the local computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Continue a Windows Service
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses the ServiceController component to continue a paused service.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Pause a Windows Service
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses the ServiceController component to pause the a service on the local computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Retrieve a List of Services
CodeSnippet.Description: Creates a string of array of the services on the local computer.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Start a Windows Service
CodeSnippet.Description: Starts a Windows service application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Stop a Windows Service
CodeSnippet.Description: Stops a Windows service application.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Find the Current User's Name
CodeSnippet.Description: Retrieves the name of the current user.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Perform an Action when System Power Mode Changes
CodeSnippet.Title: Perform an Action when System Power Mode Changes
CodeSnippet.Description: Performs an action when the system power mode changes.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Respond to Timer Event
CodeSnippet.Description: Responds to a timer event.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Use BeginInvoke on a Control to Run Code Asynchronously
CodeSnippet.Title: Use BeginInvoke on a Control to Run Code Asynchronously
CodeSnippet.Description: Uses BeginInvoke on a control to run code asynchronously.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Add a DependencyProperty Registration (Attached)
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds code to register an attached DependencyProperty. This snippet must be added to a class that derives from DependencyObject.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Add a DependencyProperty Registration (Read-Only)
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds code to register a read-only DependencyProperty. This snippet must be added to a class that derives from DependencyObject.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Add a DependencyProperty Registration
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds code to register a read-write DependencyProperty. This snippet must be added to a class that derives from DependencyObject.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Add a RoutedCommand Registration
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds code to register a RoutedCommand.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.LocalizedName: Add a RoutedCommand CanExecute and Executed Handler
CodeSnippet.Title: Add a RoutedCommand CanExecute and Executed Handler
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds CanExecute and Executed handlers. To function, these handlers must be hooked to a CommandBinding.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation

CodeSnippet.Title: Add a RoutedEvent Registration
CodeSnippet.Description: Adds code to register a RoutedEvent. This snippet must be added to a class that derives from UIElement.
CodeSnippet.Author: Microsoft Corporation
